verbs.description: [ARG0: Senator John McCain ( R - Ariz . )] [V: gave] [ARG1: the controversial Steele dossier about President Donald Trump] [ARG2: to then - FBI Director James Comey] , [ARGM-ADV: according to his new book]
Senator John McCain ( R - Ariz . ) gave the controversial Steele dossier about President Donald Trump to then - FBI Director James Comey , [V: according] to his new book
